definition: lit. sincerity splits open metal and metal (idiom); if you put your heart to it, you can break up metal and rocks/With a will, you can achieve anything.

sincere/authentic/really/truly

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
with a will, you can achieve anything (idiom); cf 精誠所至，金石為開|精诚所至，金石为开[jing1 cheng2 suo3 zhi4 , jin1 shi2 wei4 kai1]

If you work at it hard enough, you can grind an iron bar into a needle./cf idiom 磨杵成針|磨杵成针, to grind an iron bar down to a fine needle (idiom); fig. to persevere in a difficult task/to study diligently

related.word: 只要功夫深，铁杵磨成针

definition: there is nothing the determined person can't accomplish (idiom)/persistence will overcome
pinyin: shi4 shang4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
related.word: 世上无难事，只怕有心人

definition: a really determined person will find a solution (idiom); where there's a will, there's a way
pinyin: you3 zhi4 zhe3 shi4 jing4 cheng2

definition: just as distance determines the stamina of a horse, so does time reveal a person's true heart (proverb)
pinyin: lu4 yao2 zhi1 ma3 li4 , ri4 jiu3 jian4 ren2 xin1
related.word: 路遥知马力，日久见人心

definition: lit. nothing is difficult on this earth, if your mind is set (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
related.word: 天下无难事，只怕有心人

definition: dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success/You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up./Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.
True gold fears no fire. (idiom)
pinyin: zhen1 jin1 bu4 pa4 huo3 lian4

definition: effort will undoubtedly lead to success (idiom)
the matter depends on the individual (idiom); it is a matter for your own effort/With effort, one can achieve anything.
the road to happiness is strewn with setbacks (idiom)
lit. not to stop until one reaches the Yellow River (idiom)/fig. to persevere until one reaches one's goal/to keep going while some hope is left

definition: you get what you put in/you reap what you sow

to talk until one is blue in the face
